Suspend 3–{1}{G}{G} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {1}{G}{G} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Whenever a time counter is removed from Emanation of Evolution while it’s exiled, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature’s mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
